author: TipRanks
title: Bitcoin Depot price target raised to $9 from $7 at Noble Capital
description: Noble Capital raised the firm’s price target on Bitcoin Depot (BTM) to $9 from $7 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares after the company announced...
content: Noble Capital raised the firms price target on Bitcoin Depot (BTM) to $9 from $7 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares after the company announced that it had acquired the assets of Pelicoin, … [+521 chars]
